channel.title: Stoner Simon
channel.description: Stoner Simon - Sharing stoner along the web

item.title: Ufesas - She's The Devil In My Head
item.description:
Posted on January 13, 2014 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Rock, Uruguay

This band is just cool. Composed and recorded in an afternoon, they release their EP for free on their Bandcamp. Really chill out stoner rock, with hint of psychedelia.

item.title: Ethereal Riffian - Aeonian promo
item.description:
Posted on January 13, 2014 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Doom, Ukraine, Promo

Promo video for the second album of the uktrainian trio. It’s just plain awesome, and I can’t wait to listen to the full LP !

item.title: Solace - Man Dog
item.description:
Posted on January 6, 2014 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Doom, USA

A three-piece band from New Jersey, with vocals going from Ozzy Osbourne to hardcore screams, with intelligent guitar works and great rythm section. Those guys should really be more well-known !

item.title: Apey & The Pea - Devil's Nectar
item.description:
Posted on January 6, 2014 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Doom, Hungary

Hungarian stoner doom band, with cool vocals that reminds a bit of Phil Anselmo. Also, the cover is very neat too. And the best of all ? You can download the whole album and the first EP on their site

item.title: Drive-By Kiss - That Old Road
item.description:
Posted on December 14, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Switzerland, Stoner, Rock, Groovy

A recent band from Switzerland, groovy and with a lot of desert in their sound. I really dig it !

item.title: Indian Sunburn - Saturno
item.description:
Posted on December 12, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Sweden, Stoner, Desert Rock

Another great swedish stoner rock band ! Big bass and groovy riffing here. Also, the cover is awesome !

item.title: Boudain - King Of The Cosmos
item.description:
Posted on December 9, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Doom, USA, Groovy

This band is around for a while, but they only released their first EP this year. And it’s heavy ! Metallic fuzzy sound, with lot of groove. I just love it !

item.title: Skraeckoedlan - Haven
item.description:
Posted on November 26, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Psychedelic, Sweden, heavy

Well, Sweden seems like the new heaven of stoner. ANother awesome band, sounding very Truckfighter-esque (and I love these guys) with a more obvious psychedelic side. Awesome !

item.title: Monster Magnet - End Of Time
item.description:
Posted on November 26, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Classic, USA, New Album

I’m usually not a big fan of Monster Magnet (yeah I know, shame on me), but I tried this new album anyway, cause they are very different from one album to another. And this song just blew me away ! Thoses solis are incredible ! Nice one, Monter Magnet, nice one …

item.title: Dozer - Lightyears Ahead
item.description:
Posted on November 25, 2013 by Simon
Tagged: Stoner, Sweden, Underrated, Heavy

Another Swedish stoner band. They have been around since 2000 and it’s a shame that almost nobody knows them. An excellent band indeed !
